I developed a rash on my neck and under the arms that started as small yellow bumps and has quickly spread.
How long have you had this rash?
I've had the rash since day 4 of my hospitalization.

I didn't mention any known allergies to medications.
Final Diagnosis: Ampicillin-induced rash
